Title: Regarding Rumors of "Loved One's Call" in the Mine
Text: Recently there have been a lot of rumors in the mine, the source of which is a number of cases of missing miners that have not been resolved for the time being. The mine understands everyone's feelings, but for the sake of production safety, please consciously maintain a good working environment, do not spread rumors, and do not believe rumors. Currently Midnight Rangers members have intervened in the investigation of this incident, please be patient and wait for the results of the investigation.
